trans-unit.source: Specifies the status of a print queue or its printer.
trans-unit.target: 指定列印佇列或其印表機的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> class, this enumeration handles the print queue and the physical printer (or device) as one unit.
trans-unit.target: 像<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>類別，這個列舉型別會當做一個單位處理列印佇列和實體印表機 （或裝置）。

trans-unit.source: Some values represent the status of the physical device and others represent the status of the print queue program that is running on the print server.
trans-unit.target: 某些值代表實體裝置的狀態和其他項目代表列印佇列程式列印伺服器上執行的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to provide values for the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.QueueStatus%2A> property of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個列舉型別提供值<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.QueueStatus%2A>屬性<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this enumeration as part of a survey all printers for possible error status.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何使用這個列舉型別做調查的可能錯誤狀態的所有印表機。

trans-unit.source: The printer is busy.
trans-unit.target: 印表機忙碌中。

trans-unit.source: A door on the printer is open.
trans-unit.target: 印表機上的門為開啟。

trans-unit.source: The printer cannot print due to an error condition.
trans-unit.target: 因為發生錯誤狀況，印表機無法列印。

trans-unit.source: The printer is initializing.
trans-unit.target: 印表機初始化中。

trans-unit.source: The printer is exchanging data with the print server.
trans-unit.target: 印表機與列印伺服器交換資料中。

trans-unit.source: The printer is waiting for a user to place print media in the manual feed bin.
trans-unit.target: 印表機在等候使用者將列印媒體放入手動送紙匣中。

trans-unit.source: Status is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 狀態未指定。

trans-unit.source: Status information is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 狀態資訊無法使用。

trans-unit.source: The printer is out of toner.
trans-unit.target: 印表機的碳粉已用完。

trans-unit.source: The printer is offline.
trans-unit.target: 印表機為離線。

trans-unit.source: The printer has no available memory.
trans-unit.target: 印表機沒有可用的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: The printer's output bin is full.
trans-unit.target: 印表機的輸出紙匣已滿。

trans-unit.source: The printer is unable to print the current page.
trans-unit.target: 印表機無法列印目前頁面。

trans-unit.source: The paper in the printer is jammed.
trans-unit.target: 印表機內的紙夾住了。

trans-unit.source: The printer does not have, or is out of, the type of paper needed for the current print job.
trans-unit.target: 印表機沒有或已經用完目前列印工作所需的紙張類型。

trans-unit.source: The paper in the printer is causing an unspecified error condition.
trans-unit.target: 印表機中的紙導致未指定的錯誤狀況。

trans-unit.source: The print queue is paused.
trans-unit.target: 列印佇列已暫停。

trans-unit.source: The print queue is deleting a print job.
trans-unit.target: 列印佇列正在刪除列印工作。

trans-unit.source: The printer is in power save mode.
trans-unit.target: 印表機處於省電模式。

trans-unit.source: The device is printing.
trans-unit.target: 裝置列印中。

trans-unit.source: The device is doing some kind of work, which need not be printing if the device is a combination printer, fax machine, and scanner.
trans-unit.target: 裝置正在進行某些作業，如果此裝置是結合印表機、傳真機及掃描器的多功能裝置，則不需要列印的動作。

trans-unit.source: The printer is in an error state.
trans-unit.target: 印表機處於錯誤狀態。

trans-unit.source: Only a small amount of toner remains in the printer.
trans-unit.target: 印表機內只剩餘少量的碳粉。

trans-unit.source: The printer requires user action to correct an error condition.
trans-unit.target: 印表機需要使用者動作才能修正錯誤狀況。

trans-unit.source: The printer is waiting for a print job.
trans-unit.target: 印表機在等候列印工作中。

trans-unit.source: The printer is warming up.
trans-unit.target: 印表機準備中。
